title: Virginia Community Colleges Offering a CDL Course for Three Exam Failures
text_content:
These Virginia community colleges offer training for CDL applicants who have failed the CDL knowledge or road test three times.
BLUE RIDGE COMMUNITY COLLEGE
One College Lane
Weyers Cave
(540) 453-0240
MOUNTAIN EMPIRE COMMUNITY COLLEGE
3441 Mountain Empire Road
Big Stone Gap
(276) 523-7465
TIDEWATER COMMUNITY COLLEGE
7000 College Drive
Suffolk
(757) 822-1234
WYTHEVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE
1000 East Main Street
Wytheville
(276) 223-4700
Additional Information
To find out more about CDL training, refer to
CDL Training Schools (including three exam failures)
.
